me.recsfor.engine.search

Class MovieQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.recsfor.engine.search.BasicQuery
      • me.recsfor.engine.search.MovieQuery

  • public class MovieQuery
extends BasicQuery
    Uses the OMDb API (https://omdbapi.com) to gather movie, series, and game data for search results and group pages.
